abilities.name: Continuum Shift
abilities.details: Xenon's bracers have 3 states: Amber, Azure and Violet. Using an ability sets his bracers into the corresponding state.[n]Amber State: Basic attacks grant Xenon a stacking [as]attack speed[/] buff.[n]Azure State: Basic attacks restore a small amount of [hp]health[/] and [mp]mana[/].[n]Violet State: 1st basic attack and every 3rd subsequent basic attack deals bonus [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and the target's [db]current health[/]).

abilities.name: Chrono Bolt
abilities.details: Xenon fires a dense bolt of golden energy that deals [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all enemies hit.[n]While passing through an enemy, the bolt [db]slows[/] them for a short duration, and the bolt's own travel speed is also [db]halved[/].[n]Once the bolt exits the target's hitbox, it returns to its original speed and contiunes its flight, able to hit subsequent targets for [db]reduced damage[/].[n]Using this ability sets Xenon's bracers to Amber State.

abilities.name: Warp Zone
abilities.details: Xenon creates a localised distortion at a target location for a short duration.[n]Enemies insize the zone have their projectiles [db]slowed down[/], while Xenon gains increased [bf]range[/] if he's inside the zone.[n]Using this ability sets Xenon's bracers to Azure State.

abilities.name: Paradox Exchange
abilities.details: Xenon targets an allied hero or one of his Warp Zone. After a short delay, Xenon and the target [bf]swap positions[/].[n]Using this ability sets Xenon to Violet state.

abilities.name: Event Horizon
abilities.details: Xenon overloads his bracers, gaining the [bf]benefits[/] of all 3 Continuum Shift states for a duration.[n]During this time, Xenon can re-activate this ability once to fire a massive beam of time and space distortion, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all enemies hit and [db]freezing the cooldowns[/] of their abilities for a short duration.
